name: Don't Vacuum the Kids!
description:
Use the mouse to control the RoombA, to vacuum all of the trash to get money! You can use the money to buy upgrades by pressing . However, avoid the children who are making the mess, or otherwise your RoombA will break down entirely!

Credits: @ByteAtATime - Code, idea, integrating assets, playtesting

@elpython3 - Art, music, playtesting

Made for Trijam #208
